Class ResponseServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.adrain.llm_middleware.service.impl.ResponseServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResponseService
@Service public class ResponseServiceImpl extends Object implements ResponseService
ResponseServiceImpl is the implementation of ResponseService that handles CRUD operations for Response entities in the database. It facilitates creating, retrieving, and deleting responses associated with a user or prompt.

Utilizes ResponseRepository, ResponseMapper, and AuthenticationFacade for repository operations, mapping between entities and records, and authentication context retrieval. Temporarly uses PromptResponseLinker for avoiding circular depenendency injection.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • newResponse

      public void newResponse(ResponseRecord record)
      Saves a new Response entity to the database.

      Maps the provided ResponseRecord to a Response entity and persists it in the database.

      Specified by:
      newResponse in interface ResponseService
      Parameters:
      record - The ResponseRecord containing the response data to be saved.

    • getAllResponsesByUserEmail

      public List<ResponseRecord> getAllResponsesByUserEmail()
      Retrieves all ResponseRecord objects associated with the authenticated user.

      Fetches the users email from the authentication context and retrieves all corresponding responses from the database. Converts each Response entity to a ResponseRecord.

      Specified by:
      getAllResponsesByUserEmail in interface ResponseService
      Returns:
      A List of ResponseRecord objects associated with the authenticated user.

    • findResponsesByResponseBodyAndUserEmail

      public List<ResponseRecord> findResponsesByResponseBodyAndUserEmail(String responseBody)
      Retrieves all ResponseRecord objects associated with the authenticated user and response body.

      Fetches the users email from the authentication context and retrieves all corresponding responses from the database using response body. Converts each Response entity to a ResponseRecord.

      Specified by:
      findResponsesByResponseBodyAndUserEmail in interface ResponseService
      Parameters:
      responseBody - the substring of the response body to search for
      Returns:
      A List of ResponseRecord objects associated with the authenticated user and response body.

    • getResponseById

      public ResponseRecord getResponseById(Long id)
      Retrieves a ResponseRecord by its id.

      Fetches a Response entity from the database using its id and converts it to a ResponseRecord. Throws a ResponseNotFoundException if the entity is not found.

      Specified by:
      getResponseById in interface ResponseService
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Response to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The corresponding ResponseRecord.
      Throws:
      ResponseNotFoundException - if no Response with the given id is found.

    • getResponseByPromptId

      public Response getResponseByPromptId(Long id)
      Retrieves a Response by its associated Prompt id.

      Fetches a Response entity from the database using the id of its related Prompt. Throws a ResponseNotFoundException if the entity is not found.

      Specified by:
      getResponseByPromptId in interface ResponseService
      Parameters:
      id - The if of the Prompt associated with the Response.
      Returns:
      The mapped Response entity.
      Throws:
      ResponseNotFoundException - if no Response associated with the given Prompt id is found.

    • deleteResponseById

      public void deleteResponseById(Long id)
      Deletes a Response entity from the database by its id.

      Removes the Response entity with the specified id from the database.

      Specified by:
      deleteResponseById in interface ResponseService
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Response to be deleted.
